revised_title: Existence and Analysis of Axially Symmetric Flow Above a Rotating Disk
tldr: The article investigates the behavior of fluid above a rotating disk, focusing on axially symmetric solutions. The author proves the existence of solutions for the boundary-value problem when the suction parameter is close to zero and extends the existence theorem for all values of the parameter, with the restriction that the suction and blowing values at the disk must be of the same sign.
